Articles.Content: Debris now bounches off the Mun surface, I nearly had secondry tank take me out. Does debris bounce on Mini ??
Yep, I just had a whole lander bounce a good 50 meters earlier today off Minmus' flats and land unharmed.
Bounce?! What was the speed of it when it bounced?

Huh. That's weird!

Someone summon Danny to investigate (read: exploit), I forget the chant.
The smell of kerbals grilling on the launch pad should do the trick.
Lander? Debris? I had ORLY bouncing off moho's surface going at 50m/s. He miraculously survived.
I just hit the Mun ground with a RCS hopper traveling sideways at 100m/s. IT WAS FINE!! It unspun itself using SAS and I went on to land it with no issues at all.
